channel.title: Posts on Through The Stacks
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Through The Stacks

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Hello So I’ve been meaning to revive my blog in a while, and instead of trying to bring up the old version (based on Ghost), I’ve decided to give Hugo a shot since static site generators are so well suited for occasional bloggers such as me, who post once in a decade or so. This post is meant to try out basic formatting of the Ananke theme. Markdown As a programmer, Markdown is what I prefer for blog posts and it’s delightful that Hugo supports this out of the box and is fairly optimized for this.
